snippet.title: Cataclismo - Official Hogar's Hope Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase
snippet.description:
Learn about the story set up of Cataclismo in this latest trailer for the upcoming real-time strategy and tower defense game from the creators of Moonlighter. The trailer also gives us a look at the world, building elements, and the hordes of enemies you'll be up against. Cataclismo will be available on PC on July 16, 2024. In Cataclismo, defend the last bastion of humanity in a ruined world, building fortresses brick by brick to fend off waves of Horrors. Withstand the siege and rise above the haze in a story of hope, resilience, and community.

#IGN #Gaming
